metadata.description: Guffroy's argument during the Thermidorian Reaction exposing extremists' actions during the Reign of Terror
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Damaged, creased pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Irregular pagination. Page number 347 is used twice, and number 349 is not used. The last page number is also printed twice.
